sentences.en: China was the first country in the world to synthesize crystalline insulin, a bioactive protein.
sentences.cn: 中国在世界上最早用人工方法合成一种有生物活力的蛋白质--结晶胰岛素.

sentences.en: Diabetes is caused by a fault in the insulin production of the body.
sentences.cn: 糖尿病是由体內胰岛素分泌失调引起的.
胰岛素依赖型糖尿病患者

sentences.en: Does Shenyang where have the insulin that sells a Hua Dongbao production?
sentences.cn: 沈阳哪里有卖通化东宝生产的胰岛素?

sentences.en: I got my insulin , all right, but they broke all the damn needles.
sentences.cn: 我想要胰岛素, 但他们把针打碎了.

sentences.en: In diabetes the body produces insufficient insulin.
sentences.cn: 糖尿病患者体内不能分泌足够的胰岛素。

sentences.en: In one major form , juvenile - onset dia - betes , the pancreas supplies little , if any, insulin.
sentences.cn: 有一大类是青年发病型糖尿病, 胰腺分泌极少的(或不分泌)胰岛素.

sentences.en: Insulin is produced commercially from animals.
sentences.cn: 为获利从动物体内提取胰岛素。

sentences.en: Insulin is secreted by beta cells, specialized cells in the pancreas.
sentences.cn: 胰岛素是由胰腺中的特种细胞β细胞分泌的.

sentences.en: Insulin is secreted by special cells in the pancreas when a person eats.
sentences.cn: 胰岛素是在人进食时胰腺的一种特殊细胞分泌的.

sentences.en: Insulin is secreted by the pancreas.
Insulin treatment of high blood sugar control is the most effective means.
sentences.cn: 胰岛素治疗是控制高血糖的最有效手段之一.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the expression of insulin receptor substrate - 2 ( IRS - 2 ) in the liver of nonalcoholic fatty liver ( NAFL ) mice.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨非酒精性脂肪肝小鼠肝脏胰岛素受体底物 -2 ( insulin receptorsubstrate -2,IRS-2 ) 的表达.

sentences.en: People with type 1 diabetes must take insulin eery day.
sentences.cn: 1型糖尿病患者必须每天使用胰岛素.

sentences.en: The hormone is called insulin - like growth factor , or IGF - one.
sentences.cn: 这种激素就是所谓的胰岛素样生长因子.

sentences.en: The insulin - dosage rate is set in the electronic controller according to the patient's needs.
sentences.cn: 胰岛素的剂量注射速率,可根据病人的需要在电子控制器中预先制定.

phrases.tran_cn: 抗胰岛素性；胰岛素耐受性

trans.tran_en: a substance produced naturally by your body which allows sugar to be used for energy
